changeSet.author: Rama Prabhu R
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE employee_db.department ( DEPARTMENT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, DEPARTMENT_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, DEPARTMENT_HEAD VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (DEPARTMENT_ID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.region ( REGION_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, REGION_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (REGION_ID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.account ( ACCOUNT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, ACCOUNT_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, REGION_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (ACCOUNT_ID), UNIQUE INDEX ACCOUNT_NAME_UNIQUE (ACCOUNT_NAME ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_account_region1_idx (REGION_ID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_account_region1 FOREIGN KEY (REGION_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.region (REGION_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.location ( LOCATION_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, LOCATION_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (LOCATION_ID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.skill ( SKILL_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, SKILL_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (SKILL_ID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.designation ( DESIGNATION_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, DESIGNATION_NAME VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (DESIGNATION_ID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.user ( USER_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL, USER_ID VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, USER_NAME VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, EMAIL VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PASSWORD VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UNIQUE INDEX EMAIL_UNIQUE (EMAIL ASC) VISIBLE, UNIQUE INDEX USER_ID_UNIQUE (USER_ID ASC) VISIBLE, PRIMARY KEY (USER_SQID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.employee ( EMPLOYEE_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, EMPLOYEE_ID VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, DEPARTMENT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, ACCOUNT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, REGION_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, LOCATION_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, EMPLOYEE_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, MOBILE_NUM BIGINT(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL, EMAIL_ID VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, GRADE_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, DESIGNATION_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, REPORTING_MANAGER VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, BILLABLE_STATUS_ID INT NOT NULL, SERVICE_LINE_ID INT(11) NULL, ACTIVITY_NAME VARCHAR(45) NULL, PROJECT_TAGGING_ID INT(11) NULL, ACADEMICS_ID INT NOT NULL, JOINING_DATE DATE NOT NULL, PREVIOUS_EXP INT(3) NULL DEFAULT NULL, EXPERIENCE_GAPS INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, EXPERIENCE_CURRENT_ROLE INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, TOTAL_EXPERIENCE INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_SQID), UNIQUE INDEX MOBILE_NUM_UNIQUE (MOBILE_NUM ASC) VISIBLE, UNIQUE INDEX EMPLOYEE_ID_UNIQUE (EMPLOYEE_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_department_idx (DEPARTMENT_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_account1_idx (ACCOUNT_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_region1_idx (REGION_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_location1_idx (LOCATION_ID ASC) VISIBLE, UNIQUE INDEX EMAIL_ID_UNIQUE (EMAIL_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX `fk_employee_project_tagging1_idx` (`PROJECT_TAGGING_ID` ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_designation_idx (DESIGNATION_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_user_idx (INS_USER ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_user2_idx (LAST_UPDATE_USER ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_serviceline_idx (SERVICE_LINE_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_billable_status1_idx (BILLABLE_STATUS_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_grade1_idx (GRADE_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_academics1_idx (ACADEMICS_ID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_department FOREIGN KEY (DEPARTMENT_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.department (DEPARTMENT_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_account1 FOREIGN KEY (ACCOUNT_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.account (ACCOUNT_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_region1 FOREIGN KEY (REGION_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.region (REGION_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_location1 FOREIGN KEY (LOCATION_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.location (LOCATION_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_designation FOREIGN KEY (DESIGNATION_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.designation (DESIGNATION_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_user FOREIGN KEY (INS_USER) REFERENCES employee_db.user (USER_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_user2 FOREIGN KEY (LAST_UPDATE_USER) REFERENCES employee_db.user (USER_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_serviceline FOREIGN KEY (SERVICE_LINE_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.service_line (SERVICE_LINE_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_billable_status1 FOREIGN KEY (BILLABLE_STATUS_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.billable_status (BILLABLE_STATUS_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_grade1 FOREIGN KEY (GRADE_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.grade (GRADE_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_academics1 FOREIGN KEY (ACADEMICS_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.academics (ACADEMICS_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_employee_project_tagging1` FOREIGN KEY (PROJECT_TAGGING_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.project_tagging (PROJECT_TAGGING_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.project ( PROJECT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, DEPARTMENT_ID INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, ACCOUNT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, REGION_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, PROJECT_TAGGING_ID INT DEFAULT NULL, PROJECT_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PROJECT_MANAGER VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL, PROJECT_STATUS VARCHAR(45) DEFAULT NULL, PROJECT_START_DATE date NOT NULL, PROJECT_END_DATE date NOT NULL, INS_USER INT(11) NOT NULL, INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_USER INT(11) DEFAULT NULL, LAST_UPDATE_DATE TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (PROJECT_ID), UNIQUE INDEX PROJECT_NAME_UNIQUE (PROJECT_NAME ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_project_department_idx (DEPARTMENT_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_project_user_idx (INS_USER ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_project_user2_idx (LAST_UPDATE_USER ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_project_account_idx (ACCOUNT_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_project_region1_idx (REGION_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_project_project_tagging1_idx (PROJECT_TAGGING_ID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_project_department FOREIGN KEY (DEPARTMENT_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.department (DEPARTMENT_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_project_user FOREIGN KEY (INS_USER) REFERENCES employee_db.user (USER_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_project_user2 FOREIGN KEY (LAST_UPDATE_USER) REFERENCES employee_db.user (USER_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_project_account FOREIGN KEY (ACCOUNT_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.account (ACCOUNT_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_project_region1 FOREIGN KEY (REGION_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.region (REGION_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_project_project_tagging1 FOREIGN KEY (PROJECT_TAGGING_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.project_tagging (PROJECT_TAGGING_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.employee_project ( EMPLOYEE_PROJECT_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, EMPLOYEE_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL, PROJECT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, START_DATE DATE , END_DATE DATE , INS_USER INT(11), INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_PROJECT_SQID), CONSTRAINT EMP_PROJECT_EMPID_FK FOREIGN KEY (EMPLOYEE_SQID) REFERENCES employee_db.employee (EMPLOYEE_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT EMP_PROJECT_PROJECTID_FK FOREIGN KEY (PROJECT_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.project (PROJECT_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.employee_skill ( EMPLOYEE_SKILL_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, EMPLOYEE_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL, SKILL_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, CERTIFIED TINYINT, USED_IN_PROJECT TINYINT, INS_USER INT(11), INS_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INDEX fk_employee_has_employee_skill_employee_skill1_idx (SKILL_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_has_employee_skill_employee1_idx (EMPLOYEE_SQID ASC) VISIBLE, PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_SKILL_SQID), UNIQUE INDEX uk_employee_skill (SKILL_ID ASC, EMPLOYEE_SQID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_has_employee_skill_employee1 FOREIGN KEY (EMPLOYEE_SQID) REFERENCES employee_db.employee (EMPLOYEE_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_has_employee_skill_employee_skill1 FOREIGN KEY (SKILL_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.skill (SKILL_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.employee_possible_role ( EMPLOYEE_POSSIBLE_ROLE_SQID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, EMPLOYEE_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL, ROLE_ID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_POSSIBLE_ROLE_SQID), INDEX fk_employee_possible_role_role1_idx (ROLE_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_possible_role_employee1_idx (EMPLOYEE_SQID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_possible_role_employee1 FOREIGN KEY (EMPLOYEE_SQID) REFERENCES employee_db.employee (EMPLOYEE_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_possible_role_role1 FOREIGN KEY (ROLE_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.role (ROLE_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.employee_tools ( EMPLOYEE_TOOL_SQID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, EMPLOYEE_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL, TOOL_ID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_TOOL_SQID), INDEX fk_employee_tools_tools1_idx (TOOL_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_tools_employee1_idx (EMPLOYEE_SQID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_tools_employee1 FOREIGN KEY (EMPLOYEE_SQID) REFERENCES employee_db.employee (EMPLOYEE_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_has_tools_tools1 FOREIGN KEY (TOOL_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.tools (TOOL_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.employee_definite_role ( EMPLOYEE_DEFINITE_ROLE_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, EMPLOYEE_SQID INT(11) NOT NULL, ROLE_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_DEFINITE_ROLE_SQID), INDEX fk_employee_definite_role_employee1_idx (EMPLOYEE_SQID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_employee_definite_role_role1_idx (ROLE_ID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_definite_role_employee1 FOREIGN KEY (EMPLOYEE_SQID) REFERENCES employee_db.employee (EMPLOYEE_SQID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_employee_definite_role_role1 FOREIGN KEY (ROLE_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.role (ROLE_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION )ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.user_permission ( USER_PERMISSION_ID INT NOT NULL, USER_PERMISSION_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (USER_PERMISSION_ID))ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.user_role ( USER_ROLE_ID INT NOT NULL, USER_ROLE_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (USER_ROLE_ID))ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.user_role_permission ( USER_PERMISSION_ID INT NOT NULL, USER_ROLE_ID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (USER_PERMISSION_ID, USER_ROLE_ID), INDEX fk_user_permission_has_user_role_user_role1_idx (USER_ROLE_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_user_permission_has_user_role_user_permission1_idx (USER_PERMISSION_ID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_user_permission_has_user_role_user_permission1 FOREIGN KEY (USER_PERMISSION_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.user_permission (USER_PERMISSION_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_user_permission_has_user_role_user_role1 FOREIGN KEY (USER_ROLE_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.user_role (USER_ROLE_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION)ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.service_type ( SERVICE_TYPE_ID INT NOT NULL, SERVICE_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (SERVICE_TYPE_ID)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.product_type ( PRODUCT_TYPE_ID INT NOT NULL, PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (PRODUCT_TYPE_ID))ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.product ( PRODUCT_ID INT NOT NULL, PRODUCT_TYPE_ID INT NULL, PRODUCT_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (PRODUCT_ID), INDEX fk_product_product_type1_idx (PRODUCT_TYPE_ID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_product_product_type1 FOREIGN KEY (PRODUCT_TYPE_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.product_type (PRODUCT_TYPE_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION)ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.status ( STATUS_ID INT NOT NULL, STATUS_NAME VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (STATUS_ID))ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;

changeSet.author: Rakesh Mhaske
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS employee_db.project_service_type ( PROJECT_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, SERVICE_TYPE_ID INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (SERVICE_TYPE_ID, PROJECT_ID), INDEX fk_service_type_has_project_project1_idx (PROJECT_ID ASC) VISIBLE, INDEX fk_service_type_has_project_service_type1_idx (SERVICE_TYPE_ID ASC) VISIBLE, CONSTRAINT fk_service_type_has_project_service_type1 FOREIGN KEY (SERVICE_TYPE_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.service_type (SERVICE_TYPE_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT fk_service_type_has_project_project1 FOREIGN KEY (PROJECT_ID) REFERENCES employee_db.project (PROJECT_ID) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION)ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;
